QuestData.Title: Lessons From the Past
QuestData.Description: This unfortunate explorer has clearly suffered a bit of bad luck in the recent past.$b$bPrudence dictates that you perform the unenviable task of searching the corpse for clues that might shed light on your surroundings...
QuestData.RewardText: Odd...$b$bIt looks as if someone used gemstones as lenses.$b$bI should be able to fix them without too much trouble.
